reviewText: It seems according to this work, triad and yakuza only rule Hong Kong/Asia by stealing, terrorising and black- mailing everyone/everything, while making love, racing cars and enjoying life to limit health and money could afford between birth and being murdered young. Beautiful cast and unstopped actions make none to sleep. If you are in The Godfather DVD Collection (The Godfather/ The Godfather - Part II/ The Godfather - Part III) - proceed.
If you like hong kong triad movies, you'll love this one!  I first saw this movie at a friend's house and totally loved it. from the action scenes  to the ending twist, this movie is top notch!
